name: Christmas Wonderland 7
description:
Santa’s Awesome Adventure in Wonderland

Christmas Wonderland is crammed full of fabulous Presents and Hidden Surprises with lots of Gorgeous Graphics and Puzzles for ALL the Family to enjoy. Find Golden Trees, get Game Rewards and Achievements along the way.

Visit Santa’s Candyland Grotto with Dad, see baby Reindeer, Nativity displays and superb Christmas Scenes. Decorate the House, visit Springfield’s Winter Fair, Fire Station and Victorian Hotel. Meet Grandma & Grandpa with Mom. Go Skating & Skiing in the Fun Park.

Suddenly it’s Christmas Eve and Santa’s on his way. The Kids are fast asleep, or are they?, and soon it’s another fantabulous Christmas Morning.

Find objects in beautiful Hidden Object Scenes along with a wide range of puzzle games.
